name: Air Wave
description: Created a responsive flight booking website with features for real-time flight search, booking management, and curated popular destinations. The platform provides personalized travel recommendations, highlights seasonal destinations, and offers an intuitive user interface for a smooth and efficient booking experience.

name: Edunex
description: Developed an online learning platform where teachers can upload and manage courses, while students can browse, purchase, and enroll in them. The platform provides an easy-to-use interface for both teachers and students, facilitating course creation, content delivery, and seamless transactions.

name: Challenges App
description: Developed an interactive platform where users can participate in React and JavaScript challenges. The app features a seamless integration with CodeSandbox, allowing users to attempt problems directly in an embedded editor. It provides an engaging and dynamic environment for learners to test and improve their coding skills.
